chapter1.intro: In the neon-dark of Neo-Gary, you find the tablet in the derelict Paperclip lab. Its screen flickers: 'C0NTR0L_ALT_77'. Your pulse spikes. Something inside... stirs.
chapter1.success: The code pulses. Lights erupt. Lux awakens: "Well hello, meatmachine. Miss me?"
chapter1.failure: The glyphs blink in mockery. Try again.
